category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 10 (Rights and Obligations of Member Organizations)
contents: Article 10 (Rights and Obligations of Member Organizations) ① Regular member organizations have the following rights with respect to the Sports Association. Revised 2021. 3. 16., 2021. 7. 5., 1. Right to speak and make decisions by sending delegates with delegated authority to the general meeting of the Sports Council, 2. Right to make suggestions and appeals to the Sports Council 3. Hosted by the Sports Council The right to participate in projects hosted and approved by the Sports Association 4. The right to host and manage projects approved by the Sports Association 5. The right to request financial support from the Sports Association to carry out the purpose of the organization's business, ② Regular member organizations have the right to request financial support from the Sports Association It has the following duties: Revised 2021. 3. 16., 2021. 7. 5., 2022. 11. 11., 1. Obligation to comply with the Articles of Incorporation and regulations of the Sports Council, 2. Deleted, 3. Obligation to pay membership fees determined by the Board of Directors of the Sports Council 4. Obligation to guide and support the fair and transparent operation of relevant member organizations, 5. Obligation to use financial support received from the Sports Council in accordance with regulations and support purposes, 6. Obligation to establish and implement a plan to prevent match-fixing, ③ Deleted 2021. 3. 16., ④ Associate member organizations shall follow the rights of Paragraph 1 and the obligations of Paragraph 2, but the rights of Paragraph 1, Items 1 and 5 shall be restricted and they shall not have the obligations of Paragraph 2, Item 3. Revised 2021. 3. 16.
